title: 12/29/2020 - HOUR 1 - Tom Brady Is Underrated & Peter King
itunes:title: 12/29/2020 - HOUR 1 - Tom Brady Is Underrated & Peter King
description:
Colin reacts to the Patriots getting dominated on Monday Night Football and why the disappointing season for New England proves that Tom Brady is actually underrated. Colin compares the rise of Josh Allen to an all-time great and hall of fame quarterback. Long time NFL insider Peter King joins the show to tell Colin why the Washington Football Team's former first round pick Dwayne Haskins fizzled out so quickly.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
